title: Huge Graded T206 Lot For Sale?
author: pgellis

posts.post_title: Huge Graded T206 Lot For Sale?
posts.post_content:
I am thinking about parting with my T206 collection.  I want to sell as one group.  If I get the right price, I will part with it.  I am looking to raise some quick cash, so don't want to take the time to sell individually.

I have 214 graded T206s.  The breakdown is:

2 - SGC70
12 - SGC60
194 - SGC50
2 - SGC40
1 - PSA5
3 - PSA4

There is 10 HOFers and 6 Southern Leaguers.  I don't have any scans yet.

I can email you a spreadsheet of what I have if anyone is interested.  Price is negotiable.  Email me if you have any interest.

Thanks!
Send me a list of southern leaguers. D. [url]broughman@comcast.net[/url]
Please send me a list!  Thanks!   [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url]
Please send me what you have. Thanks Daryl email [url]bafraley@msn.com[/url]

I'll take a list.....

Thanks,
Ron
[url]legends1033@aol.com[/url]

Please send a list....I will likely make an offer on the lot for you to consider.
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Please send list and I will consider offer.  [url]ron@peosales.com[/url]

Hi, can you send me a spreadsheet as well..?  [url]Edwolf1963@aol.com[/url].

Thanks,

Ed

I've decided to hold onto the cards.  Got funding from another source.

Thanks to all who inquired.

Please send me the list. 

Thanks,
[url]Dave1943@yahoo.com[/url]

Dave

Just an fyi so you're not expecting a reply, the seller indicated in the post above yours that he decided not to sell.

Best,

Scott

Starting to re-think my latest decision to keep the collection.  It has not been an easy decision either way.  I continue to waffle.

So, that being said, if anyone is still interested, I will re-think any legitimate offers.  I am willing to come down a little from my initial $15,000 price tag.

Again, anyone interested and I can send you a complete checklist of what I have.  Again, no scans yet as I might own one of the worst scanners in the world.

Email me if you are interested.  I have added 2 more commons since my initial post in SGC50, so the total now is 216 graded cards.

Thanks,
Phil

P.S. Again, I am not willing to break up.  If I sell it, I will only sell the entire collection as one.
